section.p: The template defines the structure used to store any findings related to the organisms found and submitted under the heading of microbiology specimen. This will usually consist of susceptibility testing results, but can also be other organism-related findings such as extent of growth of an organism.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:702)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:703)

SHALL contain [1..3] id (CONF:704)
A value that is provided to ensure the uniqueness of the microbiology finding. [SDTM: MSSEQ, MSREFID, MSSPID] A single identifier, the sequence number, is required.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:705), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Microbiology Susceptibility Finding Set locally defined STATIC (CONF:1541)
A coded value that identifies the microbiology susceptibility result. The verbatim text is placed within the original text property of the CD data type. [SDTM: MSTESTCD, MSTEST. MSLOINC] If the LOINC code is available it should be used as the base code within the CD type.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode (CONF:707), where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1542)
Used to indicate whether or not an exam has been performed. [SDTM: MSSTAT]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime with data type TS (CONF:708)
The date/time that the test was performed. [SDTM: MSDTC]

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] value (CONF:709)
The microbiology specimen result, as up to three observation values, using both original units and a standard format or set of units. The finding may be recorded as a coded value - if the result is character based - or as a physical quantity - if the result is numeric. [SDTM: MSORRES, MSORRESU, MSSTRESC, MSSTRESN, MSSTRESU]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:710), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Method C85492 STATIC (CONF:711)
Indicates the method of the test or examination. [SDTM: MSMETHOD]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:712)
Identifies the SDTM or SEND domain the record is assigned to.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Domain Assignment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.30)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:713)
Allows capture of a group identifier for the finding.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Group Identifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.42)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:714)
Provides a reason for not capturing information for the finding.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.56)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:715)
Used to record the study day associated with an activity taking place during a single day.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Event Study Day (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.37)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:716)
Orients the performance of the susceptibility test with respect to a study defined timepoint.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Timing Reference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.97)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:717)
Used to record the organization performing the test.
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Test Organization (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.88)

MAY contain [0..2] interpretationCode (CONF:718), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Subject Data Interpretation Type CXXXXX STATIC (CONF:719)
Includes information used to better interpret the observation value (result). In particular, whether a value is a baseline value, and whether it has been derived. [SDTM: MSBLFL, MSDRVFL]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:720)
The record of a category to be used in organizing information items.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.20)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:721)
The record of a sub-category to be used in organizing information items.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Sub- Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.91)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:722)
The record of a category to be used in organizing finding or observation results.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Result Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.76)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:723)
Establishes a relationship between this record and another record.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Related Record (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.75)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:724)
Allows the association of a supplemental value - outside of the content specfied for the domain - to the record.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Supplemental Value (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.96)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:725)
A place to insert comments related to a particular finding.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Comment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.23)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:726)
Allows recording of additional findings related to the event.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Finding About (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.40)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:702)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:703)

SHALL contain [1..3] id (CONF:704)
A value that is provided to ensure the uniqueness of the microbiology finding. [SDTM: MSSEQ, MSREFID, MSSPID] A single identifier, the sequence number, is required.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:705), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Microbiology Susceptibility Finding Set locally defined STATIC (CONF:1541)
A coded value that identifies the microbiology susceptibility result. The verbatim text is placed within the original text property of the CD data type. [SDTM: MSTESTCD, MSTEST. MSLOINC] If the LOINC code is available it should be used as the base code within the CD type.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode (CONF:707), where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1542)
Used to indicate whether or not an exam has been performed. [SDTM: MSSTAT]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime with data type TS (CONF:708)
The date/time that the test was performed. [SDTM: MSDTC]

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] value (CONF:709)
The microbiology specimen result, as up to three observation values, using both original units and a standard format or set of units. The finding may be recorded as a coded value - if the result is character based - or as a physical quantity - if the result is numeric. [SDTM: MSORRES, MSORRESU, MSSTRESC, MSSTRESN, MSSTRESU]

MAY contain [0..2] interpretationCode (CONF:718), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Subject Data Interpretation Type CXXXXX STATIC (CONF:719)
Includes information used to better interpret the observation value (result). In particular, whether a value is a baseline value, and whether it has been derived. [SDTM: MSBLFL, MSDRVFL]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:710), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Method C85492 STATIC (CONF:711)
Indicates the method of the test or examination. [SDTM: MSMETHOD]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:712)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Domain Assignment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.30)
Identifies the SDTM or SEND domain the record is assigned to.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:713)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Group Identifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.42)
Allows capture of a group identifier for the finding.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:714)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.56)
Provides a reason for not capturing information for the finding.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:715)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Event Study Day (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.37)
Used to record the study day associated with an activity taking place during a single day.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:716)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Timing Reference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.97)
Orients the performance of the susceptibility test with respect to a study defined timepoint.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:717)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Test Organization (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.88)
Used to record the organization performing the test.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:720)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.20)
The record of a category to be used in organizing information items.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:721)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Sub- Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.91)
The record of a sub-category to be used in organizing information items.

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:722)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Result Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.76)
The record of a category to be used in organizing finding or observation results.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:723)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Related Record (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.75)
Establishes a relationship between this record and another record.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:724)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Supplemental Value (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.96)
Allows the association of a supplemental value - outside of the content specfied for the domain - to the record.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:725)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Comment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.23)
A place to insert comments related to a particular finding.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:726)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Finding About (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.40)
Allows recording of additional findings related to the event.
